LanguageData.CarryingCapacity.label: carrying capacity
LanguageData.CarryingCapacity.description: The amount of stuff this creature can carry in its hands, mouth, or other manipulators.
LanguageData.ComfyTemperatureMax.label: Maximum comfortable temperature
LanguageData.ComfyTemperatureMax.description: Above this temperature, characters will be unhappy. Significantly above this temperature, they will develop heatstroke and eventually die.
LanguageData.ComfyTemperatureMin.label: Minimum comfortable temperature
LanguageData.ComfyTemperatureMin.description: Below this temperature, characters will be unhappy. Significantly below this temperature, they will develop hypothermia and frostbite and eventually die.
LanguageData.CrawlSpeed.label: TODO
LanguageData.EatingSpeed.label: eating speed
LanguageData.FilthRate.label: TODO
LanguageData.ForagedNutritionPerDay.label: TODO
LanguageData.GlobalLearningFactor.label: fator de aprendizagem global
LanguageData.GlobalLearningFactor.description: Eficácia global de aprendizagem para todas as habilidades.
LanguageData.ImmunityGainSpeed.label: immunity gain speed
LanguageData.ImmunityGainSpeed.description: Speed at which this character gains immunity to diseases. If this is too slow, the character will die from a disease before developing immunity.
LanguageData.InjuryHealingFactor.label: TODO
LanguageData.JoyFallRateFactor.label: TODO
LanguageData.LeatherAmount.label: leather amount
LanguageData.LeatherAmount.description: The amount of leather you will get from butchering this creature.
LanguageData.LifespanFactor.label: TODO
LanguageData.MaxNutrition.label: TODO
LanguageData.MeatAmount.label: meat amount
LanguageData.MeatAmount.description: The amount of meat you will get from butchering this creature.
LanguageData.MentalBreakThreshold.label: limite de colapso mental
LanguageData.MentalBreakThreshold.description: Enquanto estiver em baixo deste nível, estão em perigo de ter um colapso mental.
LanguageData.MinimumHandlingSkill.label: minimum handling skill
LanguageData.MinimumHandlingSkill.description: This creature cannot be tamed, trained, or commanded by anyone with less than this skill in animals.
LanguageData.MoveSpeed.label: velocidade de movimento
LanguageData.MoveSpeed.description: Velocidade de movimento em quadrados por segundo.
LanguageData.PainShockThreshold.label: TODO
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.label: sensibilidade psíquica
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.description: Multiplicador do impacto de fenómenos psíquicos que afectam esta pessoa.

LanguageData.RestRateMultiplier.label: TODO
